title: Company Finder Configuration
description: Search for companies by industry and location. Returns company names, domains, and locations.

industry.title: Industry
industry.description: Industry name to search for (e.g., 'Technology', 'Healthcare', 'Restaurant', 'Law Firm')

location.title: Location
location.description: Location to search in (e.g., 'New York', 'San Francisco, CA', 'London, UK')

maxResults.title: Maximum Results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of companies to find (minimum 10)
